I'm on a journey to become a Python data engineer and MERN stack developer and I am determined to work on climate and health challenges with information technology. I'm working with front-end libraries like React and I'm developing my data manipulation and vizualization skills with Python's Pandas and Matplotlib modules. What you are seeing now is portfolio template from Code Fellows. If you like this portfolio template, make sure to ‚≠ê the repository to make it more recognizable for other users. Thank you üíú

projects.title: Code Rivals
projects.description: My first Code Fellows group project, Code Rivals is browser playable game that incorporates important programmers throughout history inspired by the pokemon battle interface. I took the lead on the JavaScript components of this project and was able to improve my skill in DOM manipulation greatly through this experience.

projects.title: Code 301 Final Project
projects.description: This is a placeholder for my Code Fellows Course 301 final project. This project will be implemented using the MERN stack.

experience.company: US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
experience.title: Microbiologist / Project Manager
